explains: v. 推荐，介绍；建议（recommend 的过去分词）
wordGroup: recommended practice 操作规程建议；推荐作法

sentences.en: It is dangerous to exceed the recommended dose.
sentences.cn: 超过建议使用的剂量会有危险。

sentences.en: She was recommended for the post by a colleague.
sentences.cn: 她获得同事推荐到这个岗位。

sentences.en: She recommended that I should take some time off.
sentences.cn: 她建议我应该休息一段时间。
